page.title: 01A day in my life
page.content: {I wake up usually at 7.30am. I get {up, get dressed, open all curtains in {the house and wake up my mum, dad and {my sister. While they're getting {dressed I make my bed and put the {kettle on. I have my breakfast of {cornflakes. I take my dog for a walk {and then do the dishes. At halfpast {eight we set off in a Morris Marina {car for school. At school, I meet my {friends. We talk usually about the {things on T.V. last night. When the {bell goes at 9.00am we go to our {classes and after registers {and reading we usually do Maths, then {after maths we go out to play. We {usually talk and walk round the field. {When the bell goes we go in and do {English until dinner. In the afternoon {we have lessons until 3.30pm. At home {after tea I watch T.V. and go to bed {at 9.00. }
